title: Freddie Mercury Tribute Ultimate BD (Full 4 Hr Show + Extras)
description:
The Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert Ultimate Complete Edition (2013) 
1 BD + 1 DVD (ISOs) [FULL 4 HOUR CONCERT - HIGH BITRATE + EXTRAS]

Notes:

This is a lovingly crafted fan-produced bootleg of the Freddie Mercury Tribute Concert which took place at Wembley Arena on April 20, 1992 in London, England.  For the first time all 4 hours are presented on a high bitrate SD Blu-ray.  A bonus DVD of extras is included with worldwide coverage of the event plus the rehearsal documentary, rare interviews and more.  Both discs are in NTSC Format.  The video quality for the main concert appears 1st generation or lower from an extremely clean source.  Features 2 audio tracks: stereo LPCM and Dolby Digital 5.1.    

This complete version of the concert includes the following tracks not present on any of the official releases:

Extreme: "Love of My Life" and "More Than Words" 
Def Leppard:  "Animal" and "Let's Get Rocked"
Spinal Tap: "The Majesty of Rock"
U2: "Until The End of the World"
Mango Groove: "Special Star"
Queen + Robert Plant: "Innuendo"


Track list:
